name: places/ChIJCwewLZFZwokRGkrcTYJhZxM
formattedAddress: 29 Washington Square W Ste 1C, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 29 Washington Square W Ste 1C, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I worked for Dr. Theresa Tretter for 2 weeks in my gap year between undergrad and medical school. She refused to pay me for those two weeks of labor and to this day I have received no compensation for 120 hours of work that I completed for her. This was not in any way an "unpaid internship". We had agreed on a rate of $12/hour when I was hired. After 2 weeks, she told me she would be paying me $9/hour. (I had a bachelor's degree from NYU at the time). I told her that day I was quitting and expected to be paid, but I was never paid. This physician stole from me, and I've been in contact with others to whom she did the exact same thing. She should not be allowed to operate any business in my opinion. I am now a physician and would never expect someone to work for me for free. She was also committing regular insurance fraud, and my 2 weeks of work mostly consisted of dealing with extremely irate patients who were being charged upwards of $3000 for a routine eye exam.

originalText.text: She is quite a good doctor, and listens to what you say. As of 01/03/2019 i have no idea where she is... she appears to have changed business addresses.
